response.original_title: Inside Metal: The Pioneers of LA Hard Rock and Metal 2
response.overview: Inside Metal is an original documentary series dedicated to Heavy Metal music and its diverse array of musical styles and genres. Inside Metal delivers quintessential, candid interviews with Metal and Rock icons as well as many pivotal players: musicians, managers, concert promoters and the utmost devoted practitioners. Inside Metal is about giving fans the real inside story from the behind the scenes world of Heavy Metal and Hard Rock with in-depth interviews, ultra-rare concert footage and photographs, original music and no-holds-barred, recollections of untold stories.
response.title: Inside Metal: The Pioneers of LA Hard Rock and Metal 2
